HDG.LOG.content: logos: Being of beings > [on technology] forgotten lightning-flash of Being emerges as that alone which is worthy of thought [Being of beings has been safeguarded, the beginning of its destiny in Greek thought, still governs modern technology]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: logos: Being of beings > [on technology] forgotten lightning-flash of Being emerges as that alone which is worthy of thought [Being of beings has been safeguarded, the beginning of its destiny in Greek thought, still governs modern technology]

HDG.BC.content: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth
HDG.BC.linkedContent: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth

HDG.BC.content: subjugation to technology doesn’t appear as resistance/resentment [hide behind love? Nietzsche]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: subjugation to technology doesn’t appear as resistance/resentment [hide behind love? Nietzsche]

HDG.QB.content: “Question concerning Technology” owes lasting debt to descriptions in The Worker
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “Question concerning Technology” owes lasting debt to descriptions in The Worker

HDG.QB.content: for Jünger, technology most decisive anti-Christian power [?] > [Heidegger unloads w/ questions re: Gestalt] >Heidegger finds in Jünger a circular logic beyond “logic” that demands freedom from contradiction: reciprocal relationship btwn determinative (work) & determined (worker)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: for Jünger, technology most decisive anti-Christian power [?] > [Heidegger unloads w/ questions re: Gestalt] >Heidegger finds in Jünger a circular logic beyond “logic” that demands freedom from contradiction: reciprocal relationship btwn determinative (work) & determined (worker)

HDG.FS.content: [machine & event] difficult of thinking together question concerning technology & question of being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: [machine & event] difficult of thinking together question concerning technology & question of being

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger learned from Hölderlin uselessness of coining new words > information technology robbing language of its proper laws, mere instrument (Werkzeug) of information > [Heideggerian imperative] “untiringly work outside of all publicness (Öffentlichkeit) to keep alive (lebendig zu bewahren) a thinking that is attentive to being (ein dem Sein achtsames Denken)”: lay foundation (begründen) for distant future (ferne Zukunft), possibility of tradition (Überlieferung) [to come, arrival?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger learned from Hölderlin uselessness of coining new words > information technology robbing language of its proper laws, mere instrument (Werkzeug) of information > [Heideggerian imperative] “untiringly work outside of all publicness (Öffentlichkeit) to keep alive (lebendig zu bewahren) a thinking that is attentive to being (ein dem Sein achtsames Denken)”: lay foundation (begründen) for distant future (ferne Zukunft), possibility of tradition (Überlieferung) [to come, arrival?]

HDG.FS.content: technology not grounded in physics, physics grounded in essence of technology > [Kant establishes program of program] physics observes nature as succession [series, sequence] of things, not as course of things emerging (hervorgehenden) from each other [like Aristotle]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: technology not grounded in physics, physics grounded in essence of technology > [Kant establishes program of program] physics observes nature as succession [series, sequence] of things, not as course of things emerging (hervorgehenden) from each other [like Aristotle]

HDG.FS.content: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst
HDG.FS.linkedContent: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst

HDG.FS.content: as technology unfolds objectivity (Gegenständlichkeit) (as a manner of sending) transforms more into standing reservedness (Beständlichkeit) > no longer objects today only standing reserves (beings held in readiness for being consumed [Verbrauchtwerden]), no longer substances but subsistances > energy politics, politics of agriculture: systematic ordering of space w/in general planning, directed toward future exploitation (Ausbeutung), everything arranged in horizon of utility: orderability (Bestellbarkeit) [better than Beherrschung] of what is to be seized > for example: forest as “greenspace” (stock, supply, means)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: as technology unfolds objectivity (Gegenständlichkeit) (as a manner of sending) transforms more into standing reservedness (Beständlichkeit) > no longer objects today only standing reserves (beings held in readiness for being consumed [Verbrauchtwerden]), no longer substances but subsistances > energy politics, politics of agriculture: systematic ordering of space w/in general planning, directed toward future exploitation (Ausbeutung), everything arranged in horizon of utility: orderability (Bestellbarkeit) [better than Beherrschung] of what is to be seized > for example: forest as “greenspace” (stock, supply, means)

HDG.FS.content: man is plaything of technology, positionality (Ge-stell) requires man to correspond w/ exploitation/consumption > cybernetics becomes replacement for philosophy/poetry > modern man a slave to forgetfulness of Being, when disciplines (human sciences) bear no relation to their ground
HDG.FS.linkedContent: man is plaything of technology, positionality (Ge-stell) requires man to correspond w/ exploitation/consumption > cybernetics becomes replacement for philosophy/poetry > modern man a slave to forgetfulness of Being, when disciplines (human sciences) bear no relation to their ground

HDG.MA.content: Nobel prize winners declare “Science is a road to a happier human life” > this statement as far as possible from reflective insight into our age, forget to ponder/ask: what is ground that enabled modern technology to discover/set free new energies in nature? > nature has become a “gigantic gasoline station” [Ge-stell] (technical epoch developed in 17th century Europe)
HDG.MA.linkedContent: Nobel prize winners declare “Science is a road to a happier human life” > this statement as far as possible from reflective insight into our age, forget to ponder/ask: what is ground that enabled modern technology to discover/set free new energies in nature? > nature has become a “gigantic gasoline station” [Ge-stell] (technical epoch developed in 17th century Europe)

HDG.MA.content: decisive question: how can we tame vast atomic energies, secure mankind against their danger > technological advance will move faster & faster, can’t be stopped > man hasn’t made forces of technology [?], they’ve moved beyond his will, outgrown his capacity for decision
HDG.MA.linkedContent: decisive question: how can we tame vast atomic energies, secure mankind against their danger > technological advance will move faster & faster, can’t be stopped > man hasn’t made forces of technology [?], they’ve moved beyond his will, outgrown his capacity for decision

HDG.MA.content: defenselessness to superior power of technology? only if man abandons intention to pit meditative thinking against calculative thinking > unceasing demand of meditative thinking [infinitely demanding]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: defenselessness to superior power of technology? only if man abandons intention to pit meditative thinking against calculative thinking > unceasing demand of meditative thinking [infinitely demanding]

HDG.MA.content: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things: “yes” & “no” to technology, let devices into our life but remain dependent on something highter
HDG.MA.linkedContent: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things: “yes” & “no” to technology, let devices into our life but remain dependent on something highter

HDG.MA.content: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws
HDG.MA.linkedContent: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws

HDG.MA.content: possible that technology in atomic age could captivate/bewitch/dazzle/beguile so that calculative thinking accepted/practiced as the only way of thinking [end of philosophy] > keep meditative thinking: persistent courageous thinking allows Gelassenheit, openness to Geheimnis, to flourish
HDG.MA.linkedContent: possible that technology in atomic age could captivate/bewitch/dazzle/beguile so that calculative thinking accepted/practiced as the only way of thinking [end of philosophy] > keep meditative thinking: persistent courageous thinking allows Gelassenheit, openness to Geheimnis, to flourish

HDG.TC.content: discovery of technology unleashed powers of nature as process of annihilation encompassing earth
HDG.TC.linkedContent: discovery of technology unleashed powers of nature as process of annihilation encompassing earth
